text: This is a List of Privy Counsellors of the United Kingdom appointed during the reign of King Edward VII, from 1901 to 1910. ==Edward VII== ===1901=== *William Dalrymple Maclagan (1826–1910) *Lewis Fry (1832–1921) *Frederick Halsey (1839–1927) *Edmund Barton (1849–1920) *Sir Samuel Griffith (1845–1920) *Sir Francis Richard Plunkett (1835–1907) *Sir Mortimer Durand (1850–1924) *Sir Dighton Macnaghton Probyn (1833–1924) *The Earl Roberts (1832–1914) *The Lord Wenlock (1849–1912) *Sir Spencer Ponsonby-Fane (1824–1915) *Arthur Winnington-Ingram (1858–1946) *The Marquess of Cholmondeley (1858–1923) *The Lord Chesham (1850–1907) *The Lord Milner (1854–1925) *Sir James Charles Mathew (1830–1908) *Sir Herbert Cozens-Hardy (1838–1920) *The Duke of Buccleuch (1831–1914) *Sir Henry Aubrey-Fletcher, Bt (1835–1910) *Sir Andrew Richard Scoble (1831–1916) ===1902=== *Sir Arthur Wilson (1837–1915) *Sir John Charles Day (1826–1908) *Sir John Winfield Bonser (1847–1914) *The Earl of Leven (1835–1906) *The Earl of Dudley (1867–1932) *The Earl of Minto (1845–1914) *The Lord Rothschild (1840–1915) *The Lord Kelvin (1824–1907) *The Lord Lister (1827–1912) *Sir Michael Henry Herbert (1857–1903) *George Wyndham (1863–1913) *Sir Edward Grey, Bt (1862–1933) *Sir John Dorington, Bt (1832–1911) *Sir Hugh Guion MacDonnell (1832–1904) *Sir Antony MacDonnell (1844–1925) *Sir Alfred Comyn Lyall (1835–1911) *Sir Albert Henry Hime (1842–1919) *Sir Robert Bond (1857–1927) *Sir Ernest Cassel (1852–1921) *Richard Haldane (1856–1928) *Arthur Frederick Jeffreys (1848–1906) *James Round (1842–1916) *Austen Chamberlain (1863–1937) *Sir Richard John Cartwright (1835–1912) *The Lord Revelstoke (1863–1929) *Sir Joseph Cockfield Dimsdale (1849–1912) *George Henry Finch (1835–1907) *Henry Hobhouse (1854–1937) *Sir Savile Crossley, Bt (1857–1935) ===1903=== *Randall Davidson (1848–1930) *Hon. Sir Francis Bertie (1844–1919) *The Earl of Onslow (1853–1911) *Sir Arthur Charles (1839–1921) *Sir Ralph Henry Knox (1836–1913) *Lord Stanley (1865–1948) *Hon. Alfred Lyttelton (1857–1913) *H. O. Arnold-Forster (1855–1909) *The Marquess of Salisbury (1861–1947) *Charles Dickson (1850–1922) ===1904=== *Sir Edwin Henry Egerton (1841–1916) *Sir Charles Hardinge (1858–1944) *Sir Henri Elzéar Taschereau (1836–1911) *Sir Gainsford Bruce (1834–1912) *Charles Booth (1840–1916) *William Kenyon-Slaney (1847–1908) *James Parker Smith (1854–1929) *Sir Alexander Fuller-Acland-Hood, Bt (1853–1917) ===1905=== *Sir Gorell Barnes (1848–1913) *The Earl Cawdor (1847–1911) *Hon. Ailwyn Fellowes (1849–1928) *Sir Arthur Nicolson (1849–1928) *Sir Edward Goschen (1847–1924) *The Earl of Mansfield (1860–1906) *The Lord Rayleigh (1842–1919) *The Lord Tennyson (1852–1928) *Sir Robert Finlay (1842–1929) *Arthur Cohen (1829–1914) *Sir Frederick Matthew Darley (1830–1910) *John Atkinson (1844–1932) *Edward Carson (1854–1935) *Sir Alfred Wills (1828–1912) *John Satterfield Sandars (1853–1934) *Victor Cavendish (1868–1938) *Sir Charles Dalrymple, Bt (1839–1916) *Amelius Lockwood (1847–1928) *Sir Robert Reid (1846–1923) *John Sinclair (1860–1925) *David Lloyd George (1863–1945) *John Burns (1858–1943) *Augustine Birrell (1850–1933) *Sydney Buxton (1853–1934) *Lewis Vernon Harcourt (1863–1922) ===1906=== *The Earl of Liverpool (1846–1907) *The Earl of Sefton (1871–1930) *The Earl Beauchamp (1872–1938) *Richard Causton (1843–1929) *Thomas Shaw (1850–1937) *Thomas Burt (1837–1922) *Sir Balthazar Foster (1840–1913) *John Ellis (1841–1911) *The Duke of Manchester (1877–1947) *The Lord Reay (1839–1921) *Edmund Robertson (1845–1911) *Henry Labouchère (1831–1912) *John Moulton (1844–1921) *Sir Maurice de Bunsen (1852–1932) *Sir George Farwell (1845–1915) *Sir John Brunner, Bt (1842–1919) *Sir James Kitson, Bt (1835–1911) *Sir Francis Mowatt (1837–1919) *Sir Cecil Clementi Smith (1840–1916) *Robert Farquharson (1836–1918) *George William Palmer (1851–1913) *Sir Ernest Mason Satow (1843–1929) *Sir Henry Buckley (1845–1935) *Sir Arthur Kekewich (1832–1907) *Sir Claude Maxwell Macdonald (1852–1915) ===1907=== *The Lord Sandhurst (1874–1954) *The Earl of Granard (1874–1948) *The Lord Farquhar (1844–1923) *George Whiteley (1855–1925) *William McEwan (1827–1913) *Charles Stuart Parker (1829–1910) *George W. E. Russell (1853–1919) *Sir Charles Tupper, Bt (1821–1915) ===1908=== *The Lord FitzMaurice (1846–1935) *Walter Runciman (1870–1949) *Thomas Buchanan (1846–1911) *Thomas Lough (1850–1920) *Sir Gerard Lowther (1858–1916) *Alfred Emmott (1858–1926) *Sir Thomas Palmer Whittaker (1850–1919) *Charles Milnes Gaskell (1842–1919) *Sir Edward Walter Hamilton (1847–1908) *Sir John Edge (1841–1926) *Sir Charles Fitzpatrick (1853–1942) *The Earl Grey (1851–1917) *Sir Fairfax Cartwright (1857–1928) *Sir Rennell Rodd (1858–1941) *Jack Pease (1860–1943) *Herbert Samuel (1870–1963) *Sir Charles McLaren, Bt (1850–1934) *Sir Edward George Clarke (1841–1931) ===1909=== *Cosmo Lang (1864–1945) *The Lord Northcote (1846–1911) *Sir John Bigham (1840–1929) *Alexander Ure (1853–1928) *Charles Hobhouse (1862–1941) *Russell Rea (1846–1916) *John X. Merriman (1841–1926) *Sir Hudson Kearley (1856–1934) *James Stuart (1843–1913) *Hon. Sir Walter Hely-Hutchinson (1849–1913) *Sir Edward Hobart Seymour (1840–1929) *Sir Edgar Speyer (1862–1932) Struck off 1921 *Sir Henry Enfield Roscoe (1833–1915) *J. E. B. Seely (1868–1947) *James Tomkinson (1840–1910) *Syed Ameer Ali (1849–1928) ===1910=== *Hon. Ivor Guest (1873–1939) ==References== 1901
title: List of Privy Counsellors (1901–10)
